    Reference

    All functions

    block_produce_plot()

    Produces a block plot

    box_produce_plot()

    Produces a set of box plots, allows for the inclusion of specific points

    compute_grand_mean()

    Computes the grand mean of a data frame

    compute_mean_df()

    Basic function to group by all factors and compute a mean

    effects_compute_df()

    Produce a table of |effects| sizes for factors up to the specified interaction depth

    effects_one_term_df()

    Compute effect differences of main effects in effects df table format

    effects_produce_plot()

    Produce |effects| plot

    effects_two_term_df()

    Compute effect differences of two_term interactionseffects in effects df table format

    effects_two_term_level_df()

    Compute all of the effect sizes for all of the different pairings of one combination of Factor variables

    eh_position_legend()

    Customizes the position of the legend This replaces the "outside" argument in plots that customizes legend positioning

    eh_title()

    Replaces title of a plot. Title can contain new lines with escape characters for multi-line plots.

    eh_window_limits()

    Zoom the plot to the desired x and y axis limits

    eh_x_label()

    Replaces x-axis label of a plot

    eh_y_label()

    Replaces y-axis label of a plot

    geom_text_custom()

    Custom geom text custom rendering geom

    get_custom_draw_key()

    Custom Geom Text Object draw key method

    get_custom_text_object()

    Get Custom geom_text object to have legends contain symbols in graph

    get_plot_data()

    Returns the current plot data frame as a data frame object

    get_title()

    Returns the current plot title as a string

    get_x_label()

    Returns the current plot x-axis label as a string

    get_y_label()

    Returns the current plot y-axis label as a string

    interact_compare_produce_plot()

    Produces a main effects plot

    main_effects_mar_produce_plot()

    Produces a main effects plot with a pre-computed intermediary data frame

    main_effects_produce_plot()

    Produces a main effects plot

    mizr_block_plot()

    Produces a block plot

    mizr_box_plot()

    Produces a set of box plots, allows for the inclusion of specific points

    mizr_det_plot()

    Produce a Detection Error Tradeoff (DET) Curve Plot

    mizr_effects_plot()

    Produce effects Plot

    mizr_histogram_plot()

    Plots a histogram

    mizr_interact_compare_plot()

    Produces a two-term interaction plot with respect to the treatment_var comparison factor

    mizr_lag_plot()

    The Lag Plot of Filliben's Fourplots

    mizr_long_to_wide()

    Converts a long data frame to a wide data frame.

    mizr_main_effects_hsd_plot()

    Produces Honest Significant Differences (HSD) Confidence Intervals on the Effects

    mizr_main_effects_mar_plot()

    Produces a marginal main effects plot

    mizr_main_effects_plot()

    Produces a main effects plot

    mizr_make_formula()

    Construct a formula string of response_var ~ effects_var_vec, interaction depth specified

    mizr_normal_prob_plot()

    Produce a normal probability plot

    mizr_order_plot()

    Produce an Order Plot of the 10-step series

    mizr_run_plot()

    The Run Plot of Filliben's Fourplots

    mizr_scatter_doe_plot()

    Produces a scatter plot that colors and shapes by the treatment factor

    mizr_scatter_effect_plot()

    Produces a scatter plot that does a main effect of x_var by response_var

    mizr_scatter_plot()

    Produces a basic scatter plot that colors and shapes by the treatment factor

    mizr_scatter_treatment_plot()

    Produces a scatter plot that colors and shapes by the treatment factor

    mizr_set_theme()

    Set ggplot theme to default mizr theme Sets the theme to the default mizr theme The theme can be further updated with: old_theme <- theme_set(theme_get() + <updates>)

    mizr_sign_test_plot()

    Produces a block rank plot

    mizr_tile_table_count_plot()

    Produce a Colored Table of all counts of the number of attributes

    mizr_tile_table_plot()

    Produce a Colored Table of all factors

    mizr_tile_tf_count_plot()

    Produce a Colored Table of all counts of all two-factor combinations

    mizr_tile_tf_plot()

    Produce a title table of all two-factor combinations. Used to provide information on two-term interactions

    mizr_weighted_to_unweighted()

    Provides an aggregated data frame that weighs examples by category

    mizr_wide_to_long()

    Converts a wide data frame to a long data frame.

    one_term_level_avg_df()

    Compute main effect category averages

    save_plot()

    Exports the plot as an image file

    scatter_doe_produce_plot()

    Produces a scatter plot that colors and shapes by the treatment factor

    scatter_effect_produce_plot()

    Produces a scatter plot that does a main effect of x_var by response_var

    scatter_produce_plot()

    Produces a basic scatter plot that colors and shapes by the treatment factor

    scatter_treatment_produce_plot()

    Produces a scatter plot that colors and shapes by the treatment factor

    sign_test_compute_df()

    Computes a sign test rank df from the block plot

    sign_test_produce_plot()

    Produces a sign test rank plot

    view_plot()

    Show plot
